statements.statement: select * from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS order by CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID

select * from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS
CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID$'
CLSKETQUA_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$'
FILE_NAME_ORI = '$FILE_NAME_ORI$'
FILE_NAME = '$FILE_NAME$'
TYPE = '$TYPE$'
FILE_NAME_PATH = '$FILE_NAME_PATH$'
MOTA = '$MOTA$'
TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID
select * from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS where CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID = '$value$' order by CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID
select * from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS where CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID$' order by CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID

insert into TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS ( CLSKETQUA_ID , CATEGORY_DOCUMENT_CODE , BENHNHAN_ID , MABENHNHAN , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , FILE_NAME_ORI , FILE_NAME , TYPE , FILE_NAME_PATH , MOTA , TINHTRANG , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #CLSKETQUA_ID# , #CATEGORY_DOCUMENT_CODE# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #MABENHNHAN# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #FILE_NAME_ORI# , #FILE_NAME# , #TYPE# , #FILE_NAME_PATH# , #MOTA# , #TINHTRANG# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
statements.update: update TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS set CLSKETQUA_ID = #CLSKETQUA_ID# , FILE_NAME_ORI = #FILE_NAME_ORI# , FILE_NAME = #FILE_NAME# , TYPE = #TYPE# , FILE_NAME_PATH = #FILE_NAME_PATH# , MOTA = #MOTA# , TINHTRANG = #TINHTRANG# , NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO# , NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS
CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID$'
CLSKETQUA_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$'
FILE_NAME_ORI = '$FILE_NAME_ORI$'
FILE_NAME = '$FILE_NAME$'
TYPE = '$TYPE$'
FILE_NAME_PATH = '$FILE_NAME_PATH$'
MOTA = '$MOTA$'
TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
delete from TT_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS where CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID in #LST_DEL_CLSKETQUA_DOCUMENTS_ID[]#
